parameter.name: refreshToken
parameter.label: Refresh Token
parameter.description: Refresh token for account authentication. Please see the documentation on how to get hold of it.

parameter.name: clientID
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: Client ID for the Tesla Developer Account being used.

parameter.name: proxyAddress
parameter.label: Proxy Address
parameter.description: Hostname for the server running tesla-http-proxy. If a port is required, use https://localhost:4443
